text: Kufikira pamene chilamulo chathu chidadza, ndipo nthaka idayamba kutulutsa madzi. Ife tinati: “Lowetsa m’chombo zinthu ziwiriziwiri, (chachimuna ndi chachikazi), anthu a banja lako kupatula iye amene chiweruzo chaperekedwa kale ndi iwo amene akhulupilira. Koma si ambiri amene adali okhulupirira ndi iye kupatula ochepa okha
